name: Avenger
text:
Whenever you attack one of your sworn enemies, if no other enemy characters are next to either of you, you gain the following effect: The first time you roll dice for that attack, before you score them, you may change one die to any value.

You gain the Swear Vengeance ability:
Cost: 0 AP.
Choose an enemy character. It becomes your sworn enemy.
Restriction: You must not already have any sworn enemies.

Increase your devotion to your chosen deity by 1.
